description:
Clothing needs to be warm, breathable and robust when freeriding – and the fleece GP classic knit hoody is all that and much more. They use the highly functional merino fleece grid plus in the casual hooded jacket with traditional wool knit inserts to combat the wind and cold during speedy descents – it provides optimum insulation and perfect climate regulation on cold days at a relatively low weight. Two front pockets keep the hands nice and warm during breaks, providing plenty of space for those little essentials.

A cell phone, keys and money can be securely stowed in the breast pocket. The merino wool on the inside is pleasantly comfortable and feels snug and soft on the skin. The classic in a casual freeride style with a modern interpretation – a new favorite for the winter!
name: Ortovox Fleece GP Classic Knit Hoody - Mens
